title: Self-Determination Theory-Based Online Chinese Learning Motivation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese language knowledge at the beginner level, such as foundational Chinese characters and pronunciation
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, designed as a job-linked short course for SME employees outside working hours, offering flexible learning environments via personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can enhance online Chinese learning motivation by 20% or more through activities applying Self-Determination Theory elements (autonomy, competence, relatedness) in VR simulation environments
Learners will set ≥3 weekly learning goals following SMART principles, achieve ≥70% goal completion via weekly feedback, and write ≥3 reflective entries in a learning journal.
Learners implement at least three scenarios of Chinese language application in real-world work environments through simulation-based role-playing (virtual conversations, cultural experiences).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
